abstract: Khalid Boulahrouz (pronounced [xɑˈlit bulɑˈrus]; born 28 December 1981 in Maassluis) is a Dutch footballer who plays for Danish club Brøndby IF. His nickname is "The Cannibal" for his ability to "eat up" the opposition. He is noted for his tackling and versatility at the back.Prior to joining Brøndby, Boulahrouz had played top-flight football in the Netherlands, Germany, England, Spain and Portugal. A full international from 2004 to 2012, he earned 35 caps and was included in the Dutch squads for two World Cups and two European Championships.
